document_data.name: Ready House of the Right Strong Hand
document_data.staff: Vigilant Godseye [[Tathlosar Brimmerbold]] and 36 other Helmite [[priest]]s
document_data.mainbody:
The '''Ready House of the Right Strong Hand''' was the local temple of [[Helm]] in the city of [[Berdusk]].

The temple was overseen by Vigilant Godseye [[Tathlosar Brimmerbold]], who was aided by three dozen lesser [[priest]]s.
document_data.History: As of the {{YearlinkName|1358}}, the temple had over one hundred followers among the local Berduskan populace.
